headline: NEW RICE KRISPIES TREATS BLISS RAISES THE 'BAR' ON SALTY-SWEET INDULGENCE; The classic marshmallow treat just got even more decadent with two new fan-inspired flavors
summary: CHICAGO- Nothing unlocks childlike joy quite like a Rice Krispies Treats bar and now the brand is turning up the indulgence with all-new Rice Krispies Treats Bliss bars. For the first time, the iconic...
